description: Tasks that require going out as commonly expressed in conversation

pick up dry cleaning.title: Pick Up Dry Cleaning
pick up dry cleaning.description: Collect cleaned clothes from dry cleaner

pick up package from post office.title: Pick Up Package
pick up package from post office.description: Collect package from post office or delivery center

pick up kids from school.title: School Pickup
pick up kids from school.description: Collect children from school at the end of the day

drop off package at post office.title: Mail Package
drop off package at post office.description: Send package via postal service or carrier

drop off library books.title: Return Library Books
drop off library books.description: Return borrowed books to the library

drop off children at school.title: School Dropoff
drop off children at school.description: Take children to school in the morning

drop off car for service.title: Car Service Dropoff
drop off car for service.description: Leave car at service center for maintenance or repair

return purchased item to store.title: Store Return
return purchased item to store.description: Return item to retail location for refund or exchange

return online purchase.title: Online Order Return
return online purchase.description: Return item purchased online via shipping service

return borrowed item to friend.title: Return Borrowed Item
return borrowed item to friend.description: Give back item borrowed from friend or family member

deposit check at bank.title: Bank Deposit
deposit check at bank.description: Deposit check at bank branch or ATM

withdraw cash from ATM.title: ATM Withdrawal
withdraw cash from ATM.description: Get cash from automated teller machine

purchase groceries at store.title: Grocery Shopping
purchase groceries at store.description: Buy food and household necessities at supermarket

buy specific item at specialty store.title: Specialty Shopping
buy specific item at specialty store.description: Purchase specific item from a specialized retailer

attend medical appointment.title: Medical Appointment
attend medical appointment.description: Visit doctor, specialist, or healthcare provider

go to dental checkup.title: Dental Appointment
go to dental checkup.description: Visit dentist for examination or procedure

get vehicle serviced.title: Car Service
get vehicle serviced.description: Take vehicle for maintenance or repairs

renew driver's license.title: License Renewal
renew driver's license.description: Update driver's license at government office

take pet to veterinarian.title: Vet Visit
take pet to veterinarian.description: Bring pet for medical examination or treatment

attend court appearance.title: Court Appearance
attend court appearance.description: Appear in court for legal proceedings

priority_scale.1: Very Low - Optional errands for convenience
priority_scale.2: Low - Can be postponed without significant consequence
priority_scale.3: Medium - Should be completed in a reasonable timeframe
priority_scale.4: High - Important errands with potential consequences if delayed
priority_scale.5: Very High - Critical errands that affect health, legal status, or major responsibilities
